name: Chess On Ice
description:
Have you ever wanted to play Curling? Of course not. But have to ever wanted to play a curling-like, action-packed, fast-paced, thrill-ride of couch multiplayer? Yes you do!

Have some quick, lighthearted fun with your friends as you learn to navigate the world of ice billiards.

FEATURES - WHAT'S HERE NOW:

  • HOT SEAT MULTIPLAYER! Only have one controller? No problem, play with up to three other friends in fully supported 2v2 matches.
  • CUSTOMIZATION! Change the rules to your liking. Create the game of curling you want!
  • IMPROVISE, ADAPT, OVERCOME! No two games of curling are exactly the same, to do well, you will have to adapt to the circumstances of every game.
  • SCRATCH THAT CURLING BUG! This game was built from the ground up by a competitive curler. If you want to keep up with strategy, shot types, and practice off-the-ice, this game is for you!

EARLY ACCESS - WHAT'S MISSING:

  1. Complete Overall of UI
  2. Redone Art Style for Higher Definition and Animated Sprites
  3. Full Customizability of Physics Engine
  4. Full Support for multiple controllers
  5. Menu Music, In-game Music
  6. Presentation System for Introducing, and Concluding, Games
  7. Commentary System
